attributes.action: CLOSE YOUTH OFFENDERS INSTITUTES....TO HELP STOP YOUTHS KILLING THEMSELVES WHICH IN PROTECTIVE CUSTODY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE THE INTENDED ARE TRYING TO GET CLOSURE OF YOUTH OFFENDERS INSTITUTES...TOO MANY YOUNG PEOPLE ARE KILLING THEMSELVES WHILE SUPPOSEDEDLY IN PROTECTIVE CUSTODY.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
